title: PhD Thesis: The lateral horn primes innate olfactory behaviours
author: AS Bates
summary: This thesis reconstructed neural networks from electron microscopy data to understand how the Drosophila lateral horn processes olfactory information to drive innate behaviors. Won the MRC LMB Max Perutz Prize 2019 and the British Neuroscience Association Postgraduate Prize 2020.
